Name: require_project_status
Description: Ensure project status matches required state

Name: require_team_status
Description: Team must be active to participate

Name: require_worker_status
Description: Only active workers can be assigned

Name: require_task_status
Description: Only 'To Do' or 'In Progress' tasks considered

Name: require_sprint_status
Description: Sprint must be active or upcoming

Name: require_feature_priority
Description: Features must have high or medium priority

Name: require_user_story_status
Description: Only open or in-progress user stories allowed

Name: require_release_status
Description: Only planned or active releases are valid

Name: require_board_type
Description: Scrum board must be digital or physical

Name: require_snapshot_test_status
Description: Only snapshots with passed tests are deployable

Name: require_stakeholder_relevance
Description: Stakeholder relevance must be above low
